page.title: 01Dawlish and District
page.content: Dawlish is by the sea and also very hilly. It is mainly a holiday resort, it is busy in the summer. We have mainly old people in our town who are retired, the people are friendly. The hotels are reasonable but not superb! People who live here usually work outside Dawlish. The most common form of transport is the car, but people also use buses and trains. Our main tourist attraction is our beach, but also our unusually odd swans which are black. We have a children's park where children play all through the week. In the winter it is wet and windy, but in the summer it is reasonably warm. Once a year we have a carnival of a mixture of people who dress up. This year we had an elected mayor who helps in the running of the town, especially with the twinning association, we are twinned with Carhaix in France.
